Great quality for the price. Sort of sexy on. I have c cup and ordered xl and 225 lbs and fit perfectly. It’s soft, not too thick but warm enough for winter and cool enough for spring or chilly summer day. The strap in front lays flat and does not have issues with riding up or down- really well made- exactly what you see in picture. Have bought from this company many times and always happy with my purchase. I got cranberry and white and they are true to color. White is true bleach white not ivory or cream. Would buy again. White is not see through as long as you have the right bra on.

My girlfriend is quite busty, and she's been really hestitant about ordering garments online, as she likes to try on everything before she buys, just to be sure. I've researched her body type extensively, so I'm confident in ordering surprise garments for her. Well, she loves it, and how it covers her nicely, yet she can express her shape in a tasteful manner. She enjoys the feel of the fabric, and like all her form-fitting garments, she washes them on the delicate cycle and hang dries everything. Being a 34 DDD and a 26 inch waist, it fits wonderfully! I'm still her favorite!

The material is thick and perfect for cooler days, and the dark green color is absolutely gorgeous. The long sleeves fit well, especially if you have longer arms, and the overall fit is form-fitting without being too tight. I was initially worried it might be revealing, but it's not at all.  I wish the front fabric across the top were a bit tighter, it drapes a little bit on me but not enough to alter the overall appearance of the top. I found it ran slightly larger than expected; as a 36D, I opted for an XL, which worked well overall.  I washed on eco warm, dried on low, no ironing needed (big plus) and noticed there was no fading or seam breakdown so this top seems to be pretty nice quality!
I had to return this but i wouldn’t have if it came in a bigger size.  Way to tight snd small for 5’10” frame.  Made well and smooth material.  It would be flattering on a really skinny girl.
I love this top. Fits perfectly.
